original: Eklöf, Bengt Josef, disponent, Jönköping, f. 20/1/21 i Jönköping. G. 43 m. Karin Werme. Barn: Anna f. 47. — Realex. 37. Stud:res. t. Tyskl. 36, Tyskl. o. Schweiz 37, Engl. 38, USA 47. Anst. v. A-B Löfsko sed. 39. Hob-bies : isegling, ’skidåkning.
translated: Eklöf, Bengt Josef, manager, Jönköping, b. January 20, 1921 in Jönköping. Married in 1943 to Karin Werme. Children: Anna b. 1947. Completed secondary education in 1937. Studied abroad in Germany in 1936, Switzerland in 1937, England in 1938, and visited the United States in 1947. Employed by A-B Löfsko since 1939. Hobbies: sailing, skiing.
